00025 
00027 // Windows specific : defines the WinMain entry function,
00028 // so that developers can use the standard main function
00029 // even in a Win32 Application project, and keep a portable code
00031 
00032 
00033 #if defined(_WIN32)
00034 
00035     #include <windows.h>
00036 
00037     extern int main(int argc, char* argv[]);
00038 
00039     int WINAPI WinMain(HINSTANCE, HINSTANCE, LPSTR, INT)
00040     {
00041         return main(__argc, __argv);
00042     }
00043 
00044 #endif // _WIN32
